subject: Pangram request

messageBody:
I'm chipping away at a new font and a pangram'd be nice to use as a testing device. Can we come up with one?

Inessential desiderata:

- has a spot where an upside-down NO would be optimal (after, say, the EAT in bean)
- has a spot where the alternate UTTER would be best (-al/-el/-le/-il)
- has 'ks' and 'gz' in Ax/Exam-capable places
- uses LOCH (and maybe LLAN too)
